Clear Paralogue 53: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 53: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 53: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Altina, the founder of Begnion, and her
descendant Sanaki, binding past and future.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn /
Path of Radiance.

Daughter of Count Varley, Minister of Religion
to the Adrestian Empire. Pressed to join the
winter festival despite her fear of strangers.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Noble of the Leicester Alliance and daughter
of House Goneril. Will this lazy girl lift a finger
at the winter festival? Appears in Fire Emblem:
Three Houses.

Senior Statesman of Begnion and Prime Minister
who serves Sanaki. Wields his abilities with
great skill even at the winter festival. Appears
in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

Heir to the Dukedom of Fraldarius. What trials
await during the winter festival for one known
for always practicing with his sword? Appears
in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the
Harmonized button. This skill can be used only
once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be
used by units deployed using Pair Up.)

Resonance Effect: Radiant Dawn /
Path of Radiance
Increases scores in Resonant Battles.
(More details can be found in the Help
messages within Resonant Battles.)

They can counter ranged attacks and
nullify effects that prevent counters.
They can even preempt foes' attacks!

Can effectively get Atk/Spd+22 when
conditions are met! It seems she's
also skilled at hiding in her room?!

Can heal 20 HP and remove negative
status effects from allies. For allies,
grants Def/Res and blocks foe Special.

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Effective against flying foes. If unit is within
2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit
during combat and inflicts Special cooldown
charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack.)

Effective against flying foes. If unit is within
2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit
during combat and inflicts Special cooldown
charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack.)

Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, if unit's
HP = 100% and unit is within 2 spaces of
an ally, deals 1 damage to unit and allies
within 2 spaces of unit. If unit's HP < 100%
at start of combat, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit
during combat and reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 30%.

Grants Def/Res+2 and “inflicts Special
cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack” to
allies within 2 spaces of unit during combat.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Grants Def/Res+2 and “inflicts Special
cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack” to
allies within 2 spaces of unit during combat.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Res+5 and bonus to Atk/Res during
combat = current penalty on each of those
stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to
Atk, grants Atk+19, for a net bonus of Atk+12.)
Calculates each stat bonus independently.

If it is an even-numbered turn and unit's HP =
100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

If it is an even-numbered turn and unit's HP ≥
50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

If it is an even-numbered turn, unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot
make a follow-up attack.

$aAt start of odd-numbered turns, neutralizes
any【Penalty】on allies within 2 spaces of unit
and restores 5 HP to those units.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aAt start of odd-numbered turns, neutralizes
any【Penalty】on allies within 2 spaces of unit
and restores 10 HP to those units.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aAt start of odd-numbered turns, neutralizes
any【Penalty】on allies within 2 spaces of unit
and restores 20 HP to those units.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aGrants【Resonance: Blades】to unit and allies
from the same titles as unit.

Grants【Vantage】to unit.

【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.

【Vantage】
If foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack
before foe's first attack for 1 turn.
